headline.main: CHINESE EXPECT FALL OF KINHWA; Capital of Chekiang and Its Airfield Said to Be About to Be Cleared of Foes CHIANG PROMISES VICTORY Generalissimo Tells Churchill He Will Fight 'Until the Last Aggressors Give Up'

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Sept 2 (U.P.) -- Kinhwa, the capital of Chekiang Province, which has an air base within medium bomber reach of Japan, is about to fall to Chinese troops battering into its environs from three sides, a communique said tonight.
abstract: Chiang Kalshek message to Churchill pledges continued Chinese battle against aggressors
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Sept 2 (U.P.) -- Kinhwa, the capital of Chekiang Province, which has an air base within medium bomber reach of Japan, is about to fall to Chinese troops battering into its environs from three sides, a communique said tonight....
